adHeader: DO YOU NEED TO HAUL SOMETHING ON A PICK UP TRUCK FOR $40?
adDetails: I own a pickup truck (toyota tacoma) and an enclosed trailer 6'x12', if you are moving or buying stuff (small or big) on CRAIGSLIST, IKEA, COSTCO, BEST BUY, TARGET, WALMART, or any other furniture store, RAIN or SHINE, I can help you to haul your stuff. You don't have to rent a uhaul truck and pay a bunch of fees. I have a very clean truck (I don't haul any dirt or constrution debris). You would get my help and my truck to load and unload your stuff, you won't pay for gas, I have ratchetable straps, tie downs, and blankets to secure your items. My rate starts at $40 for local hauling. I AM FLEXIBLE AND AN EASY GOING PERSON. All you have to do is give me a call at show contact info. My name is IGNACIO. THANKS.
